channel.title: Need server help!
channel.description:
i have a server (fr33sc4p3) that i have edited, but every time i load it up it says "server started ip 0.0.0.0 port 43594. how do i change the port, server i.p and make it so other people can go on my server, some1 help please.
thanks to all who help
sorry but i am a bit of a noob. how do i register the i.p and make it online?

item.title: Need server help!
item.dc:creator: @cant_touch_this93 cant touch this93
item.description:
@cant_touch_this93 wrote:

to change the port go to server.java and hit ctrl f and search for “43594”. It should come up with 43594/43594 default or something like that. change the 43594 too what ever port you want. and for server ip download no-ip at www.no-ip.com. then register an ip.

Read full topic
